alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued April 01 at 3:06PM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 10 or more inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Much of Carbon County including Rawlins, Arlington, and Shirley Basin. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin
